remarks: Lemma for ~ iprodefisum .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement:
iprodefisumlem.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
iprodefisumlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
iprodefisumlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> CC ) $.
iprodefisumlem $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , ( exp o. F ) ) = ( exp o. seq M ( + , F ) ) ) $.
